channel.title: Help ...error.... please
channel.description:
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 12 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:368) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:29) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:55) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I was adding some drops to my NPCDrops.tsm, and i compiled and it was fine, then i started my server, and it gave me this error:

item.title: Help ...error.... please
